lines: April 18th, 2828 AD
Today marks the eight year anniversary of the HKM Uriel incident.
Eight years of war. I see no end in sight.
May God save our Greater United Nations.
-Journal entry, Ring Leader

script.speaker: ringleader
lines: Welcome aboard, lieutenant.

script.speaker: jester_22
lines: Thank you, sir.

script.speaker: ringleader
lines: Looks like you’ve been with the 140th fleet for the duration of your service.
It’s true that you led a squad of medium fighters in the battle for Epsilon Eridani as an ensign?

script.speaker: jester_22
lines: Affirmative, sir. My squad leader took a direct lance blast, so I assumed control.

script.speaker: ringleader
lines: War is hell, lieutenant. It seems to me that you got results. Am I wrong?

script.speaker: jester_22
lines: I completed the mission, sir.

script.speaker: ringleader
lines: Good. You’re now in charge of the 2nd squadron. You’ll bear the callsign Jester 22.
There will be time for formalities and introductions later. We’re about to engage an enemy strike force with critical info.
You are to scout the area, find the enemy battleship, and ping its location.

script.speaker: ringleader
lines: Sir, yes, sir.

script.speaker: tanizaki
lines: Sir, we received the coordinates.

script.speaker: ringleader
lines: Good. Wolfpack, you may move in range and fire at your earliest convenience.

script.speaker: captain_rand
lines: On it. Lance’s II, III, IV, and V follow me.

script.speaker: ringleader
lines: Splendid, all fighters return to the fleet.
Captain Rand, you and your lances are to scan the wreckage for intelligence.

script.speaker: captain_rand
lines: Acknowledged.

script.speaker: ringleader
lines: Good work everyone. I’ll brief High Command on our success.
Jester 22, welcome to the Entropy Circus. I think you’ll fit in just fine.
